entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers. Snow level 1700 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
